query:
select
            url,
            title,
            created_at,
            tags_string
        from bookmark_with_tags
        where
            user_id = $1
            and is_archived = 0
            and bookmark_id in (
                select bt.bookmark_id
                from bookmark_tags bt
                join tags t on bt.tag_id = t.tag_id
                where t.name = $2
            )
        order by created_at desc
        limit $3 offset $4
